response.overview: Young Pietari lives with his reindeer-herding father in arctic Finland. On the eve of Christmas, a nearby excavation makes a frightening discovery and an evil Santa Claus is unleashed…
response.tagline: This Christmas everyone will believe in Santa Claus
response.title: Rare Exports: A Christmas Tale

titles.title: Rare Export - From the Land of the Original Santa Claus
